parameters: \N<Irime>Oh, isn't that Segi? What are you doing up at this hour?
\N<Segi>Irime-san...

\N<Irime>Hehe, I understand how you feel. You've heard about the
matter, haven't you? It's no wonder you can't sleep with a
clear mind.
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Irime>Seriously... what's this about military training tactics? In
the end, it's just a spectacle for those guys to kill time
and comfort themselves.

\N<Segi>A spectacle for comfort... I hate to admit it, but you might
be right.

\N<Irime>...Yuia-san is participating in tomorrow's tournament,
right?
\N<Segi>Yes... he says he will, but...
\N<Irime>...I see. Well, that's a relief for starters.

\N<Irime>Yuia-san is a renowned skilled fighter. There's no man in
this town who can easily beat him.
\N<Segi>But I... I'm just... worried...
\N<Irime>...
\N<Segi>Ah...

\N<Irime>Hehe, don't worry about it. It's exactly as you think. My
husband is bedridden with illness. He's in no condition to
fight.
\N<Segi>Then... what will you do?

\N<Irime>Well, that's obvious. If my husband can't do it, then I'm
the only one left, right? There's no way I'd let that child
fight.
\N<Segi>So... so you mean... Irime-san will...?

\N<Irime>I was originally a member of the vigilante group myself. I
won't be outdone by the men. I'll show those who
underestimate me because I'm a woman what I'm made of.
\N<Segi>But... please... don't push yourself too hard...?

\N<Irime>I know. But now is the time when I have to push myself if
ever there was one. You should remember that too.
\N<Segi>...
A

\N<Irime>I was originally a member of the vigilante group myself. I
don't fall behind the men. I'll show those who underestimate
me because I'm a woman what I'm made of.

\N<Irime>I was originally a member of the vigilante group myself. I
don't fall behind the men. I'll show those who underestimate
me because I'm a woman what I'm made of.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
\N<Irime>Hello, Segi-san...

\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Segi-san... did you come to visit me? I'm sorry... for
being in such a state...

\N<Segi>No, don't worry about that. More importantly, how are you
feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Not too bad, but still... I'm seriously ill, as you can see,
and I can't move around freely.

\N<Irime's Husband>That's why, swallowing my pride, I want to ask you for a
favor... about my wife. About Irime...

\N<Irime's Husband>She's always concerned about me and acts bravely, but she's
a woman with a fragile core. Yet, as you can see, I'm
literally unable to support her or be of any help...

\N<Irime's Husband>Especially at times like these... I want you, someone I
trust, to help her in my stead.
\N<Segi>...Understood. If I can be of any help, then by all means.
\N<Irime's Husband>Thank you... Hearing those words puts me at ease.

\N<Irime's Husband>Not knowing what will become of my wife and daughter... and
the future of this town... it's frustrating to be so
powerless.

\N<Segi>Please don't worry about that and focus on your recovery.
Surely that's what's best for Irime-san and everyone else.
\N<Irime's Husband>...Thank you. You are a kind-hearted woman...

\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Segi-san... Did you come to visit me? I'm sorry... for
being in such a state...

\N<Segi>No, don't worry about that. More importantly, how are you
feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Not too bad, but still... I've been seriously ill, and as
you can see, I can't move around freely.

\N<Irime's Husband>That's why, swallowing my pride, I want to ask you for a
favor... about my wife. About Irime...

\N<Irime's Husband>She's always concerned about me and acts bravely, but she's
a woman with a fragile core. Yet, as you see, I'm literally
unable to support her or be of any help...

\N<Irime's Husband>Especially at times like these... I want you, someone I
trust, to be there for her in my stead.
\N<Segi>...Understood. If I can be of any help, then certainly.
\N<Irime's Husband>Thank you... Hearing those words puts me at ease.

\N<Irime's Husband>Not knowing what will become of my wife and daughter... and
the fate of this town... it's shameful how powerless I am.

\N<Segi>Please don't worry about such things and focus on your
recovery. Surely that's what's best for Irime-san and the
others.
\N<Irime's Husband>...Thank you. You are a kind-hearted woman...
